title: 97/741/EC: Council Decision of 24 July 1997 on the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an Exchange of Letters between the European Community and the Russian Federation establishing a double-checking system without quantitative limits in respect of the export of certain steel products covered by the EC and ECSC Treaties from the Russian Federation to the European Community
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 24 July 1997 on the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an Exchange of Letters between the European Community and the Russian Federation establishing a double-checking system without quantitative limits in respect of the export of certain steel products covered by the EC and ECSC Treaties from the Russian Federation to the European Community (97/741/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
1. The Agreement in the form of an Exchange of Letters between the European Community and the Russian Federation establishing a double-checking system without quantitative limits in respect of the export of certain steel products covered by the EC and ECSC Treaties from the Russian Federation to the European Community is hereby approved on behalf of the European Community.
2. The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1997.
For the Council
The President
M. FISCHBACH
(1) OJ L 247, 13. 10. 1995, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 247, 13. 10. 1995, p. 30.
(3) OJ L 247, 13. 10. 1995, p. 2.
